===Etymology===

===Proper noun===
{{ja-pos|proper|こしんとう|hhira=こしんたう}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=こしんとう|religion|Shinto}} a reconstruction of [[Shintō]] as practiced originally before any influence from [[Buddhism]] or [[Confucianism]]
#: This focuses on Shintō as expressed mainly in classical writings such as the [[w:Kojiki|''Kojiki'']]; the [[w:Nihon Shoki|''Nihon Shoki'']]; records of court ceremony, laws, and customs written by members of the [[w:Fujiwara clan|Fujiwara clan]] in the 900s through 1100s CE, primarily the [[w:Engishiki|''Engishiki'']], and the ''Daiki'' ({{w2|ja|台記}}) [[memoir]]s of [[w:Fujiwara no Yorinaga|Fujiwara no Yorinaga]]; and the [[w:Man'yōshū|''Man'yōshū'']].
